thread.section_title: Hotel Baume - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superb!
thread.title_full: Superb! - Review of Hotel Baume, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: OnTheBrum
title: Superb!
text:
Excellent service - very helpful, welcoming and attentive staff.
Lovely, clean and comfortable surroundings, but not too stuck up!
Great room - quiet, spotless, new, very tastefully furnished and decorated, excellent facilies ... really good value in Paris for this quality.
Good location - about 15 minutes walk from Le Marais, under 10 minutes to Notre Dame.
Overall - very special. Thanks!
